about.title: I am a frontend (JavaScript) engineer especially interested in building magical web application experiences, scaling systems up, and shipping reliable web applications

education.university: Pune Vidhyarthi Griha's College Of Engineering, Nashik

skill.title: I am self tought programmer, writting code for better part of decade, I started as a Backend dev on PHP but moved to Frontend/ JavaScript ecosystem in last 4 years.

list.title: Sr. Frontend developer
list.jobDetails: I work with Bonzer, as a Frontend developer (VueJs, ReactJs, ES6, Jest, JavaScript). My roles and responsibilities involves, system design and architect, writing clean, reusable and scalable Vue and React components.

list.title: Sr. Fullstack developer
list.jobDetails: I was working as a Fullstack developer (PHP+ Vue and React) with Aresss Software. My role involved gathering project requirements, building a project plan and schedule for it, project management to an extent and working with the rest of the team in the development phase. I have worked on a number of PHP frameworks ranging from CodeIgnitor, Laravel, Zend to Symfony along with PHP CMS like Wordpress and Magento along with Frontend technologies like Vue and React depending on Project requirements.

list.title: PHP developer
list.jobDetails: I was working with BackTech as a PHP developer using CodeIgnitor framework, on their product DialNashik. DialNashik was a local classified site for small businesses in the area to post their ads, products and services and was quite extensive multi-tenant system. My role primarily involved working on the development end of the product working both on web applications as well as API for mobile apps while collaborating with the design and DBA team.

list.title: PHP developer
list.jobDetails: I was working on Elance platform now known as Upwork as a Freelance web developer mostly on PHP web applications. As I was working by myself my role involved Design -> Development -> Testing -> Deployment.

users.name: Usman Ali
users.recommendation: I have worked with Shashikant for the past 3 years. It wont be an understatement to say that he is a Vue.js ‘genius’. Shashi is highly qualified for any Single Page App product for several reasons. Shashi is an important contributor to our project. He consistently delivers high quality work, meets or exceeds expectation, and assists his co-workers at every opportunity. He never missed a deadline.

users.name: Yogesh Suryawanshi
users.role: Senior Consultant at Infogain | Magento 2 | Node js | E-commerce Expert | AWS | Javascript
users.recommendation: Shashikant is one of the best among all people I have ever met and is a loyal colleague, understands complex matters. Shashikant is a strong and goal oriented team player, with every problem there was a solution. Highly recommended.

contact.title: Want to say hello? Want to know more about me? Give me a call or drop me an email and I will get back to you as soon as I can.
